title: supply chain integration
extract: Supply chain integration is a close alignment and coordination within a supply chain, often with the use of shared management information systems. ... Supply chain refers to all inputs required to produce a product and fulfill a purchase.Oct 12, 2015
extract_html: Supply chain integration is a close alignment and coordination within a supply chain, often with the use of shared management information systems. ... Supply chain refers to all inputs required to produce a product and fulfill a purchase.Oct 12, 2015
